channel.title: [PI] Outside edge bank wild or pvp coords?
channel.description: Does anyone have the coords for like outside edge bank is wild or pvp

item.title: [PI] Outside edge bank wild or pvp coords?
item.dc:creator: @Bandos1337 Bandos1337
item.description:
@Bandos1337 wrote:

whaa… Honestly you’ve never heard of a command? If your server is PI based, it probably has ::mypos. if not, just add it in the commands file. You type ::mypos in your client’s chatbox, its called a command.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Outside edge bank wild or pvp coords?

item.title: [PI] Outside edge bank wild or pvp coords?
item.dc:creator: @Epicmaul Epicmaul
item.description:
@Epicmaul wrote:

[quote=“Marine5288, post:2, topic:398235”]Type ::dataon and it will give you the coordinates. Also you can add a ::mypos command to tell you it, just put this in

commands.java

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos") && playerRights >= 0) { c.sendMessage("X: "+c.absX); c.sendMessage("Y: "+c.absY); }[/quote]
No i need the exact coords and i dont know what they are and i dont know where i type ::mypos

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Outside edge bank wild or pvp coords?

Type ::dataon and it will give you the coordinates. Also you can add a ::mypos command to tell you it, just put this in

commands.java

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos") && playerRights >= 0) { c.sendMessage("X: "+c.absX); c.sendMessage("Y: "+c.absY); }
